original_text: Joseph was thirty years old when he entered the service of Pharaoh king of Egypt. And Joseph went out from the presence of Pharaoh and went through all the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 요셉이 애굽 왕 바로 앞에 설 때에 삼십 세라 그가 바로 앞을 떠나 애굽 온 땅을 순찰하니

sentences.original_text: when he entered the service of Pharaoh
And Joseph went out from the presence of Pharaoh
and went through all the land of Egypt
